sentences.english: The interest at stake of the intervenor appellant and the administrative appeal.
sentences.chinese: 二参加人与本诉愿之利害关系。

sentences.english: The state shall fairly investigate and deal with complaints and petitions as fixed by law.
sentences.chinese: 国家应当进行公平的调查并依法处理投诉和诉愿”。

sentences.english: Article 68 The administrative appellant or intervenor appellant may present the documentary evidence or other evidence during the procedure.
sentences.chinese: 第68条诉愿人或参加人得提出证据书类或证物。

sentences.english: Article 32 An administrative appellant or intervenor appellant might have authorized the representative(s) to conduct administrative appeal.
sentences.chinese: 第32条诉愿人或参加人得委任代理人进行诉愿。

sentences.english: Article 32 An administrative appellant or intervenor appellant might have authorized the representative(s) to conduct administrative appeal.
sentences.chinese: 第32条诉愿人或参加人得委任代理人进行诉愿。

sentences.english: The unemployed laborers appealed to the government for help.
sentences.chinese: 失业劳工向政府提起诉愿，恳求协助。

sentences.english: The premier set his mind against all the appeals.
sentences.chinese: 首相打定主意不理会一手诉愿。

sentences.english: Terrorism recruits adherents on the basis of an appeal to human emotion.
sentences.chinese: 恐怖主义基于对人类情绪的诉愿招募追随者。

sentences.english: The agency with jurisdiction of administrative appeal shall investigate evidence based according to the application of an administrative appellant or intervenor appellant.
sentences.chinese: 受理诉愿机关应依诉愿人或参加人之申请，调查证据。

sentences.english: The agency with jurisdiction of administrative appeal shall investigate evidence based according to the application of an administrative appellant or intervenor appellant.
sentences.chinese: 受理诉愿机关应依诉愿人或参加人之申请，调查证据。

sentences.english: Article 31 An administrative appeal decision has also effects upon the intervenor appellant.
sentences.chinese: 第31条诉愿决定对于参加人亦有效力。

definition: Judicial Yuan, the high court under the constitution of Republic of China, then of Taiwan
common plea/civil appeal (as opposed to criminal case)
Executive Yuan, the executive branch of government under the constitution of Republic of China, then of Taiwan
to register (to an official organism)/to file a case (for investigation)
